reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and clear explanations. Assignments can be challenging.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor. Makes complex topics accessible and fun.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but lectures can be dry. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Tough but fair. Exams are difficult but he prepares you well.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Amazing teacher! Lab sessions are well-organized and informative.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Monotonous lectures. Seems disinterested in student questions.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Solid grasp of the material but can be intimidating in class.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Inspirational teacher. Fosters a love for reading and writing.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking discussions. Assignments are open-ended but interesting.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Interesting course content but grading can be inconsistent.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Brilliant lecturer. Brings current events into discussions effectively.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about sustainability. Field trips are a highlight.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Explains concepts poorly. Relies too heavily on textbook.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Engaging and knowledgeable. Makes art come alive in lectures.

reviews.subject: German Language
reviews.review: Patient teacher. Creates a supportive environment for language learning.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Brilliant researcher but sometimes struggles to simplify complex topics.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Real-world experience shines through. Great industry connections.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Fascinating lectures. Assignments encourage hands-on research.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but strict. Expect a heavy workload.
